ARBITRATION AGREEMENT.8: Power to refer parties to arbitration where there is an arbitration agreement.

COMPOSITION OF ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL.11A: Power of Central Government to amend Fourth Schedule
COMPOSITION OF ARBITRAL TRIBUNAL.15: Termination of mandate and substitution of arbitrator.

JURISDICTION OF ARBITRAL TRIBUNALS.16: Competence of arbitral tribunal to rule on its jurisdiction.
JURISDICTION OF ARBITRAL TRIBUNALS.17: Interim measures ordered by arbitral tribunal.

MAKING OF ARBITRAL AWARD AND TERMINATION.28: Rules applicable to substance of dispute.
MAKING OF ARBITRAL AWARD AND TERMINATION.29: Decision making by panel of arbitrators.
MAKING OF ARBITRAL AWARD AND TERMINATION.31: Form and contents of arbitral award.
MAKING OF ARBITRAL AWARD AND TERMINATION.33: Correction and interpretation of award; additional award.

RECOURSE AGAINST ARBITRAL AWARD.34: Application for setting aside arbitral award.

MISCELLANEOUS.39: Lien on arbitral award and deposits as to costs.
MISCELLANEOUS.40: Arbitration agreement not to be discharged by death of party thereto.
MISCELLANEOUS.42B: Protection of action taken in good faith.

PART IA – ARBITRATION COUNCIL OF INDIA.43B: Establishment and incorporation of Arbitration Council of India.
PART IA – ARBITRATION COUNCIL OF INDIA.43E: Vacancies, etc., not to invalidate proceedings of Council.
PART IA – ARBITRATION COUNCIL OF INDIA.43H: Appointment of experts and constitution of Committees thereof.
PART IA – ARBITRATION COUNCIL OF INDIA.43-I: General norms for grading of arbitral institutions.
PART IA – ARBITRATION COUNCIL OF INDIA.43L: Power to make regulations by Council.

NEW YORK CONVENTION AWARDS.45: Power of judicial authority to refer parties to arbitration.
NEW YORK CONVENTION AWARDS.48: Conditions for enforcement of foreign awards.

GENEVA CONVENTION AWARDS.54: Power of judicial authority to refer parties to arbitration.
GENEVA CONVENTION AWARDS.57: Conditions for enforcement of foreign awards.

PART IV – SUPPLEMENTARY PROVISIONS.82: Power of High Court to make rules.
PART IV – SUPPLEMENTARY PROVISIONS.86: Repeal of Ordinance 27 of 1996 and saving.
PART IV – SUPPLEMENTARY PROVISIONS.87: Effect of arbitral and related court proceedings commenced prior to 23rd October, 2015.
